random_name: A random name is generated if you do not provide one.
command_info: Command to be executed on the server after connection (optional).
delete_info_last: connection is selected for deletion. The current session with this connection will be terminated.
delete_info_group_last: group is selected for deletion. All current sessions within this group will be terminated.
settings_General_autoStart: Start sRemote when you sign in to your computer
settings_General_keepBackground: Keep sRemote running in the background
settings_Connections_autoConnect: Automatically connect to all networks upon application startup
settings_Connections_readyTimeout: How long (in milliseconds) to wait for the SSH handshake to complete
ssh_failed_to_connect: Failed to connect to the remote server
ssh_host_terminated: Remote host terminated an existing connection
